N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4000.5 - Arbitration hearings

State Regulations

The board will fix the date and time of hearing and designate
the mediator who will arbitrate the dispute. Cases assigned to staff may be
subject to adjournment at any time if it is necessary to assign the mediator to
a mediation matter. It is also the policy of the board that, where a matter is
assigned to a staff arbitrator before proceeding with the hearing, the parties
will be required to frame the issue, agree thereon and sign a stipulation on a
form furnished by the board. In the event the parties cannot agree on the issue
or either or both refuse to sign the submission agreement, the staff arbitrator
may frame the issue and proceed with the arbitration or recommend to the board
that the matter be referred to panel arbitration. Notes
